H0.text: Make oxygen is the main function of a group of muscle cells that work together in the human body to form a muscle.

H1.text: Release energy is the main function of a group of muscle cells that form a muscle in the human body, with different kinds of muscles working together.

H2.text: Digesting nutrients is the main function of a group of muscle cells that work together to form each muscle in the human body.

H3.text: Cause movement is the main function of a group of muscle cells, which together form each muscle type in the human body.

A4.text: Skeletal muscle constitutes the majority of muscle mass in the body and is responsible for locomotor activity.
